name: Loafin' Around
description:
"Loafin' Around" is an endless runner where the player gets to play as a sentient loaf of bread, wandering around in an endless house! Collect butter & jam, dodge obstacles, and get as high of a score as possible!

======================
MECHANICS/HOW TO PLAY:

You are continuously moving forward as obstacles try to block your path! You are capable of climbing 1-block tall obstacles and dodge using (A) and (D), but be careful. When moving, you move back a space, and moving back too much results in a gameover. Collecting jars of jam will allow you to move forward a space AND dodge an obstacle directly in front of you, while collecting butter will increase your score. Get as far as you can and get the highest score as possible!

======================

This game was made within 5 days as a project for class, using the Phaser 3 framework. If you have any feedback please let me know!
